item.title: Amazon Cloudwatch alarm to Jaconda - a Telegram Smartbot
item.description: We have setup Amazon Cloudwatch alarms to keep track of various metrics. In a situation where a particular alarm is triggered, a notification is sent to a Amazon Notification Topic. Within that Amazon Notification Topic, one of the subcription uses the lambda protocol. It is through this subscription which we would get Amazon Lambda to send a message to Jaconda - a Telegram Smartbot. Here’s a sample Node.js script that we have used.
